about_the_game:
The original Five Nights at Restroom adventure has been remade and improved. Now you can play Five Nights at Restroom like never before and discover the original story originally released on Halloween 2023.

Meet Papunny and Toilet Bear in an improved version of the original 2023 version. Enter the rift zone like never before and face the terrors of nighttime diarrhea.

content_descriptors.notes: In a 2D minigame, a person can die with blood in a pixel art animation. It is implied that after the enemy attacks the player, the player dies.

detailed_description:
The original Five Nights at Restroom adventure has been remade and improved. Now you can play Five Nights at Restroom like never before and discover the original story originally released on Halloween 2023.

Meet Papunny and Toilet Bear in an improved version of the original 2023 version. Enter the rift zone like never before and face the terrors of nighttime diarrhea.
name: Five Nights at Restroom (2025)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Play the original adventure of Five Nights at Restroom now remade and as additional content for Five Nights at Restroom 2!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
